mapper.sql: XSOGROUPKEY, ARRIVE_DATE, TYPE, FROM_STATION, FROM_VENDOR, CARRIER_NO, SHIP_NO, FLAG, EXPECT_QTY, RECEIVE_QTY, ERROR_FLAG, ERROR_QTY, TRANSPORT, SHIP_TYPE, SHIP_USER, SHIP_DATE, RECEIVE_USER, RECEIVE_DATE, SEND_USER, SEND_DATE, NOTE, GROUPKEY, STATUS, adddate, ADDWHO, EDITDATE, EDITWHO, WORKGROUP_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into XSOGROUP (XSOGROUPKEY, ARRIVE_DATE, TYPE, FROM_STATION, FROM_VENDOR, CARRIER_NO, SHIP_NO, FLAG, EXPECT_QTY, RECEIVE_QTY, ERROR_FLAG, ERROR_QTY, TRANSPORT, SHIP_TYPE, SHIP_USER, SHIP_DATE, RECEIVE_USER, RECEIVE_DATE, SEND_USER, SEND_DATE, NOTE, GROUPKEY, STATUS, adddate, ADDWHO, EDITDATE, EDITWHO, WORKGROUP_DATE) values (#{xsogroupkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arriveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromVendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{receiveQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{errorFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{receiveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sendUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{addwho,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{editwho,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workgroupDate,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update XSOGROUP
ARRIVE_DATE = #{arriveDate,jdbcType=DATE},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FROM_STATION = #{fromStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FROM_VENDOR = #{fromVendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARRIER_NO = #{carrierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIP_NO = #{shipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPECT_QTY = #{expectQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECEIVE_QTY = #{receiveQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ERROR_FLAG = #{errorFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERROR_QTY = #{errorQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRANSPORT = #{transport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIP_TYPE = #{shipType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIP_USER = #{shipUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIP_DATE = #{shipDate,jdbcType=DATE},
RECEIVE_USER = #{receiveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVE_DATE = #{receiveDate,jdbcType=DATE},
SEND_USER = #{sendUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_DATE = #{sendDate,jdbcType=DATE},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUPKEY = #{groupkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adddate = #{adddate,jdbcType=DATE},
ADDWHO = #{addwho,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDITDATE = #{editdate,jdbcType=DATE},
EDITWHO = #{editwho,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKGROUP_DATE = #{workgroupDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where XSOGROUPKEY = #{xsogroupkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update XSOGROUP set ARRIVE_DATE = #{arriveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_STATION = #{fromStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_VENDOR = #{fromVendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRIER_NO = #{carrierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIP_NO = #{shipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPECT_QTY = #{expectQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECEIVE_QTY = #{receiveQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ERROR_FLAG = #{errorFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERROR_QTY = #{errorQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRANSPORT = #{transport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIP_TYPE = #{shipType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIP_USER = #{shipUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIP_DATE = #{shipDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RECEIVE_USER = #{receiveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVE_DATE = #{receiveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, SEND_USER = #{sendUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_DATE = #{sendDate,jdbcType=DATE}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPKEY = #{groupkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adddate = #{adddate,jdbcType=DATE}, ADDWHO = #{addwho,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDITDATE = #{editdate,jdbcType=DATE}, EDITWHO = #{editwho,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKGROUP_DATE = #{workgroupDate,jdbcType=DATE} where XSOGROUPKEY = #{xsogroupkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT (case when type=0 and ship_type='01' then '01' when type=0 and ship_type='02' then '02' when type=0 and ship_type='03' then '03' when type=0 and ship_type='04' then '04' when type=0 and ship_type='05' then '05' when type=1 and ship_type='01' then '06' when type=1 and ship_type='02' then '07' else '08' end) type,sum(receive_qty) qty from xsogroup where to_char(adddate, 'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') group by type,ship_type
select description from storer where storerkey = #{id}

select b.doc_company,b.doc_compname,a.xsogroupkey register,a.receive_qty caseQty,b.doc_number,(case when b.status ='11' then '作业完成' when b.status in ('1','2','5') then '作业中' else '未作业'end) status,sum(c.doc_eqty) doc_eqty, sum(doc_cqty + doc_aqty + nvl(doc_zqty,0)) doc_aqty from xsogroup a left join jobs_xso b on a.xsogroupkey = b.doc_register left join jobscontext_xso c on b.doc_number = c.doc_number where b.doc_register = #{register} group by b.doc_company,b.doc_compname,a.xsogroupkey,a.receive_qty,b.doc_number,b.status
select company from storer_jc where storerkey = #{id}
